name: hostel-complaint-system
description: ![Complaint Management System](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/100947528/225574700-3abd3df2-93f1-4420-b324-343ac293dbb4.png) This is a **Hostel Complaint Management System** built to streamline the process of complaint registration and management for my college's hostel services. The app aims to provide a faster and more efficient way to handle complaints, improving communication between students and hostel administration.
